examples-title: Pick a preset goal or create your own
examples-subtitle: Here is a list of common goals. You can also create your own goal.

khatm.title: Read the Quran in 30 days
khatm.description: A classic khatm goal. Read 1 Juz a day

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Set a custom goal that suits you

frequency-tab.title: Choose a frequency for your goal
frequency-tab.description: Should your goal reset every day or every number of days? Don't worry, we will track your progress regardless of the frequency you choose.

daily.title: Daily goal
daily.description: Your goal will reset every day

continuous.title: Over a duration
continuous.description: Your goal will calculate your progress over a duration of days

goal-type.title: Choose a criteria for your goal
goal-type.description: Should your goal be based on time, pages, or a custom range (ie: 3 Juzs of the Quran)?

time.title: Time
time.description: Your goal will be based on time

pages.title: Pages
pages.description: Your goal will be based on pages

range.title: Custom range
range.description: Your goal will be based on a custom range of verses (this can be a chapter, a juz, or even the whole Quran)

goal-target.title: Set a target for your goal
goal-target.description: How much time, pages, or verses should you read to complete your goal?

preview-schedule.title: Here is a preview of your schedule
preview-schedule.description: This is how your goal will look like. You can always change it later.

goal-done.title: You completed today's goal
goal-done.description: Any additional reading will still be recorded

streak-definition: A streak is a number of consecutive days you have read Quran.
set-reading-goal-success: Your reading goal has been set successfully.
reading-plan-description: Create a reading plan and Quran.com will automatically track your progress and help you reach your goal.

delete-confirmation.action-text: I understand the consequence, delete my reading goal
delete-confirmation.subtitle: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete reading goal and your current progress.
delete-confirmation.title: Are you absolutely sure?
